title: Squid with Thai Basil
ingredients: ['2 squid tubes, halved, scored and cut into bite-sized pieces', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'cornflour, as needed', '2 tablespoons oil', '1 tablespoon oil', '2 teaspoons chopped garlic', '2 spring onions, chopped into 2.5cm pieces', '1 shallot, diced', '1 medium onion, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 green pepper, chopped', '3 tablespoons fish sauce', '1 tablespoon hot pepper sauce', '1/2 teaspoon sugar', '1 tablespoon water', '30g Thai basil leaves']
